issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In an HA environment I had 4 BFEBS instances that were stopped during upgrade.  After upgrade all 4 instances were shown as running. However, I could not ping them as I could before. They are not shown as running instances on the NC according to virsh list.

I have stopped one of them and then restarted it. As it tried to come back up it got the the IP of one of the other instances that was "supposedly" running. And after a minute or so is unable to reach running and goes back to stopped.
fields.environment:
\[UI CLC SC00 CC00\]
\[UI CLC SC00 CC00\]
\[WS\]
\[WS\]
\[NC00\]

comments.body:
And I am unable to start any new instance store instance as well.

cc.log  snippet at the time the instance I tried to run turned prom pending to terminated

I have manually upgraded same topology with the same pre-upgrade conditions and there is no issue seen.  Likely the issue was due to eutester upgrade script not working well on HA.

Before Upgrade:
# run 4 EBS instances as non-euca/non-admin user in 2 different security groups
# ping each instance
# stop instances
# upgrade
{code}
[root@g-19-11 test-creds]# euca-describe-instances
